name: LayerZero Bridged USDT (Etherlink)
description: LayerZero Bridged Tether (USDT) on Etherlink is a bridged version of the native Tether USDT stablecoin from other LayerZero supported chains to the Etherlink network. LayerZero USDT can be bridged to and from Etherlink using any LayerZero-supported bridge, including the Etherlink EVM bridge. All Tether tokens (USDT) are pegged at 1-to-1 with a matching fiat currency and are backed 100% by Tetherâ€™s reserves.
